name: Spoken from the Dark
description:
[Concept] From within the darkness a consciousness awakes. Lost and afraid, you are guided only by the words of a lone voice with unknown intentions. Use your wits to separate the truth from the lies in order to find your way, hopefully, to safety.

Created for "Major Jam: Isolation" 2020

Only the tutorial portion of this game is complete so technically this is more of a demo. I will still work on development even after the jam ends as I have a lot more content that I haven't had the time to implement such as an AI for the voice and multiple endings.

Controller is supported.

  • Arrow Keys = Left Analog/D-pad
  • Enter = A
  • Shift = X

Only part not made/owned by me is the BGM "Windy Mystic Ambience by melissapons of freesound, used under Creative Commons Attribution licence.

Thanks for trying my "game"!
